text: Jilani: “E achikapolo Ŵangu aŵala ŵaakulupilile! Mun’jogopani M’mbuje gwenu (Allah). Akwete kupata yambone aŵala ŵaakolosyisye (itendo yao) pa duniya pano, sano chilambo cha Allah chiŵele chakusapanguka (naga nkulepela kutenda ibada upande wine, basi jawulani upande wine). Chisimu akupilila tachipedwa mwakwana malipilo gao mwangaŵalanjila.”
